A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The movie begins at light speed and doesn't let go through the entire film. As a long time fan\, I rank this one up there with Empire Strikes Back. The action is intense\, the storyline is exciting and original\, the characters are well fleshed out\, and the special effects are perhaps the best of any movie I've ever seen. \n\nI wholeheartedly recommend it. The child in me was inspired and awed throughout.
